constraint.name: ContexstAwareSystemNameNotNullAuditRule
constraint.message: ContexstAwareSystem name must not be null

constraint.name: ConditionSocialExpressionNotNullAuditRule
constraint.message: Condition socialExpression must not be null

constraint.name: ConditionSpaceExpressionNotNullAuditRule
constraint.message: Condition spaceExpression must not be null

constraint.name: ConditionTaskExpressionNotNullAuditRule
constraint.message: Condition taskExpression must not be null

constraint.name: ConditionLogicExpressionNotNullAuditRule
constraint.message: Condition logicExpression must not be null

constraint.name: ConditionDataExpressionNotNullAuditRule
constraint.message: Condition dataExpression must not be null

constraint.name: ConditionIdNotNullAuditRule
constraint.message: Condition ID must not be null

constraints.constraint: system.routeTasks->forAll(t| (t.id<>self.id)) and system.systemTasks->forAll(t| (t.id<>self.id)) and system.preConditions->forAll(c| (c<>self) implies (c.id<>self.id)) and system.postConditions->forAll(c| (c.id<>self.id)) and system.initialConditions->forAll(c| (c.id<>self.id)) and system.finalConditions->forAll(c| (c.id<>self.id)) PreConditionIdUniqueAuditRule PreCondition ID must be unique

system.routeTasks->forAll(t| (t.id<>self.id)) and system.systemTasks->forAll(t| (t.id<>self.id)) and system.preConditions->forAll(c| (c<>self) implies (c.id<>self.id)) and system.postConditions->forAll(c| (c<>self) implies (c.id<>self.id)) and system.initialConditions->forAll(c| (c.id<>self.id)) and system.finalConditions->forAll(c| (c.id<>self.id)) PostConditionIdUniqueAuditRule PostCondition ID must be unique

system.routeTasks->forAll(t| (t.id<>self.id)) and system.systemTasks->forAll(t| (t.id<>self.id)) and system.preConditions->forAll(c| (c<>self) implies (c.id<>self.id)) and system.postConditions->forAll(c| (c.id<>self.id)) and system.initialConditions->forAll(c| (c<>self) implies (c.id<>self.id)) and system.finalConditions->forAll(c| (c.id<>self.id)) InitialConditionIdUniqueAuditRule InitialCondition ID must be unique

system.routeTasks->forAll(t| (t.id<>self.id)) and system.systemTasks->forAll(t| (t.id<>self.id)) and system.preConditions->forAll(c| (c.id<>self.id)) and system.postConditions->forAll(c| (c.id<>self.id)) and system.initialConditions->forAll(c| (c<>self) implies (c.id<>self.id)) and system.finalConditions->forAll(c| (c<>self) implies (c.id<>self.id)) FinalConditionIdUniqueAuditRule FinalCondition ID must be unique

constraint.name: TaskIdNotNullAuditRule
constraint.message: Task ID must not be null

constraints.constraint: not incoming.oclIsUndefined() TaskOutputConditionIncomingNotNullAuditRule TaskOutputCondition incoming edge must not be null
not ongoing.oclIsUndefined() TaskInputConditionOngoingNotNullAuditRule TaskInputCondition ongoing edge must not be null
incoming->size()>0 JoinIncomingGreaterThanZeroAuditRule Join incoming eadges must be greater than 0
not ongoing.oclIsUndefined() JoinOngoingNotNullAuditRule Join ongoing edge must not be null
ongoing->size()>0 SplitOngoingGreaterThanZeroAuditRule Split ongoing eadges must be greater than 0
not incoming.oclIsUndefined() SplitIncomingNotNullAuditRule Split incoming edge must not be null
not incoming.oclIsUndefined() SystemTaskIncomingNotNullAuditRule SystemTask incoming edge must not be null
not ongoing.oclIsUndefined() SystemTaskOngoingNotNullAuditRule SystemTask ongoing edge must not be null

constraint.name: SimpleTaskNameNotNullAuditRule
constraint.message: SimpleTask name must not be null

constraints.constraint: system.systemTasks->forAll(t | (t.oclIsTypeOf(SimpleTask) and t<>self) implies (self.oclAsType(SimpleTask).name<>t.oclAsType(SimpleTask).name)) SimpleTaskNameUniqueAuditRule SimpleTask name must be unique

system.routeTasks->forAll(t| (t.id<>self.id)) and system.systemTasks->forAll(t| (t<>self) implies (t.id<>self.id)) and system.preConditions->forAll(c| (c.id<>self.id)) and system.postConditions->forAll(c| (c.id<>self.id)) and system.initialConditions->forAll(c| (c.id<>self.id)) and system.finalConditions->forAll(c| (c.id<>self.id)) SystemTaskIdUniqueAuditRule SystemTask ID must be unique

system.routeTasks->forAll(t| (t<>self) implies (t.id<>self.id)) and system.systemTasks->forAll(t| (t.id<>self.id)) and system.preConditions->forAll(c| (c.id<>self.id)) and system.postConditions->forAll(c| (c.id<>self.id)) and system.initialConditions->forAll(c| (c.id<>self.id)) and system.finalConditions->forAll(c| (c.id<>self.id)) RouteTaskIdUniqueAuditRule RouteTask ID must be unique
not ongoing->oclIsUndefined() PreConditionOngoingNotNullAuditRule PreCondition ongoing edge must not be null
not incoming->oclIsUndefined() PostConditionIncomingNotNullAuditRule PostCondition incoming edge must not be null
